column3:
Concept ACK.

Travis failure is extremely scary:

```
02:08:15 1 H2FullPrunedBlockStore.<init>: org.h2.Driver loaded. 
*** buffer overflow detected ***: /usr/bin/java terminated
```

@laanwj The use of the hostname addon is meant to prevent that issue, so the workaround might not be working as expected. More info about it can be found [here](https://github.com/travis-ci/travis-ci/issues/5227)

Concept ACK, glad to see the caching issue finally sorted.
Can one of the admins verify this patch?\n
Looks like the workaround for the work-around is still failing travis :(\n
Tried to retrigger travis, still fails\n
Ready for review now, the upstream issue has been resolved.\n

I've already merged this, because I am not sure how long this pull will be in the review queue.

You could try a rebase once travis is running again to get rid of this patch and also trigger a build.
